Sentencas: In the present work the effect of cobalt oxide addition on the density and on the electrical properties of gadolinium-doped barium cerate is investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: A series of BaCe0.9-xGd0.1CoxO3-delta (x = 0.00, 0.01, 0.03, 0.05, 0.07, 0.10) samples were prepared according to the conventional solid state reaction synthesis technique.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The experimental results indicated that the addition of cobalt oxide leads to the improvement of the sintering properties and the enhancement of the grain dimensions.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: It was found that the investigated complex oxides crystallize at cubic singony.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Moreover, according to the X-ray diffraction (XRD) and the scanning electron microscopy (SEM) analyses, the prepared samples are single-phase in the range of 0.00 <= x <= 0.10, while at compositions of x >= 0.03 there is almost no open porosity.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: According to the four-probe dc electrical conductivity measurements, the conductivity of the BaCe0.9-xGd0.1CoxO3-delta samples is inferior to the undoped ones (BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-delta-BCG) in wet air atmosphere.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: However, the presence of Co in the range of 0.03 <= x <= 0.10 at higher temperatures (800-900 degrees C) has smaller impact on the electrical conductivity values.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Finally, in wet hydrogen atmosphere the electrical conductivity values of the 1 mol% Co-doped sample were found to be close enough to the ones of the undoped sample, leading to the conclusion that cobalt can be effectively employed as a sintering additive of gadolinium-doped barium cerates.
Titulo: Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ
Investigation of the structural and electrical properties of Co-doped BaCe0.9Gd0.1O3-δ
